Uses of Class
Game.BankAccount

  • Packages that use BankAccount 
    Package Description
    Database
    The Database Controller classes are a set of Facades for database access.
    Game
    These are the classes that form the main game and web site functions.

    • Uses of BankAccount in Database

      Methods in Database that return BankAccount 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BankAccount BankDatabaseController.addNewBankAccount(int bankID, int playerID)
      This creates a new BankAccount object and saves it to the database.
      BankAccount BankDatabaseController.getAccountByID(int accountID)
      This gets the BankAccount from the database that corresponds to the unique id key.
      Methods in Database that return types with arguments of type BankAccount 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<BankAccount> BankDatabaseController.getAccountListByBankID(int bankID)
      This gets the entire set of BankAccounts from the database that corresponds to the unique id key of a particular Bank.
      Methods in Database with parameters of type BankAccount 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean BankDatabaseController.updateCashBalance(BankAccount account)
      This updates the database information for cash balance of the given BankAccount.

    • Uses of BankAccount in Game

      Methods in Game that return BankAccount 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BankAccount Bank.getPlayerBankAccount(Player player)
      gets the BankAccount of the player
      Methods in Game that return types with arguments of type BankAccount 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<BankAccount> Bank.getBankAccountList()
      returns list of all BankAccounts that the bank has
      Method parameters in Game with type arguments of type BankAccount 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Bank.initialize(int id, int numHouses, java.util.ArrayList<BankAccount> accountList)
      Initialize Bank
      void Bank.setBankAccountList(java.util.ArrayList<BankAccount> bankAccountList)
      Sets the list of bank accounts for a bank at the start of a game
